page.title: 18Transport in the Felton Area
page.content: The National Bus Company provides a bus service between Bromyard and Hereford on the main road passing through the area, but the settlements of Ocle Pychard and Felton are badly served. A private bus service operates on Wednesdays and Fridays, making one journey in each direction on these days through Felton and Preston Wynne. Most families have two cars or more. Motor cycles are used by younger people and even tractors are occasionally used for social visits. Cycles are mainly used by young children, but some field workers use them for local journeys.
